name: Centennial Aviation Academy
about: Centennial Aviation Academy, based at Atlanta's DeKalb-Peachtree Airport, is a premier flight school recognized as one of the nation's top 10 by AOPA in 2016. Founded from a high school flying club, it has grown into a thriving Part 61 school with over 100 students. The academy offers personalized, scenario-based flight training for adults and specialized programs for middle and high school students. With a focus on quality instruction and student care, Centennial Aviation Academy ensures instructors are well-supported to prevent burnout. The school is committed to diversity in aviation and youth program initiatives, making it a standout in flight training. Centennial Aviation Academy is dedicated to helping aspiring pilots achieve their goals in a supportive and efficient learning environment.
